revised_title: A Meteorological Journal: Observations on Atmospherical Electricity at Knightsbridge
tldr: This article presents a meteorological journal documenting observations of atmospherical electricity at Knightsbridge from May 9, 1790, to May 8, 1791. The author, John Read, describes the apparatus used to collect and measure atmospheric electricity and provides daily records of the electrical charges, weather conditions, and any observed thunderstorms.
